definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
sheet/piece of writing/bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old)/classifier for written items: chapter, article

sentences.english: The articles are long-winded and devoid of substance.
Rudd has no experience. He is all talk, but he can't back it up, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 陸克文沒有經驗，他空話連篇，他不可能上臺”。
